div.ab: For bad bleeding(?) (lit. blood-running): Take a pomegranate and boil it in vinegar and put it on him. So will he be healed, certainly.
For the eyes, to clear the sight: crush an herb that is called in Italian pilizul, and give him the powder to drink in white wine. So will his sight clear up, certainly.

For an eye that has blood in it:
So, take verbena (vervain) that has been crushed and take the white of an egg and mix well with it, and put it on the eye [as] a plaster. So will he be healed, certainly.

For blood and darkness of the eye: Take a the herb of finocchio (fennel) and verbena (vervain) and boil it in water
, and from the same water should he wash his eyes. So will he be healed, certainly.
